adHeader: • W E D D I N G • P H O T O G R A P H Y •
adDetails: I am an up-and-coming wedding photographer based in San Jose and serve the entire San Francisco Bay Area My package is simply a la carte that includes the following, and you can add any optional services (additional photographer, albums, . . .) - Full-day coverage - Complimentary engagement session - All the files in full resolution -- you can print on your own - Enhancements of the best pictures - A private gallery with the enhanced pictures My name is Dan. It is my pleasure to capture all your special moments--for you to relive your story--for you to call me your photographer. Check out more of my work at www.danphanphoto.com If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to use the contact form in my website.
